dataElement.name: Application Priority Indicator
dataElement.commentary: Priority for secondary application

dataElement.name: Application Label
dataElement.commentary: Maestro

dataElement.name: Dedicated File Name
dataElement.commentary: Maestro AID

dataElement.name: Third Party Data
dataElement.commentary: Country code for Brazil,Unique Identifier: '0000',Device Type: 20 - Card,Proprietary Data: '00' when unused,Update Device Type to 00 - Card

dataElement.name: Log Entry
dataElement.commentary: Recommended value

dataElement.name: Application Preferred Name
dataElement.commentary: By default, set to application label 'Maestro'. Alternative value should be defined by issuer in card sample.

dataElement.name: Issuer Code Table Index
dataElement.commentary: Set to ISO/IEC 8859 Part 01: Latin-1 Western European

dataElement.name: Language Preference
dataElement.commentary: Language 1 = 'pt' for Portuguese,Language 2 = 'en' for English,Language 3 = 'es' for Spanish, Castilian

dataElement.name: Length of ICC Public Key Modulus
Length of ICC PIN Encipherment Public Key Modulus
CDOL1 Related Data Length
dataElement.commentary: Length for M/Chip Advance

dataElement.name: PIN Try Counter
dataElement.commentary: Offline PIN is supported, same value as PIN Try Limit

dataElement.name: Previous Transaction History
dataElement.commentary: default=00

dataElement.name: Application Transaction Counter Limit
dataElement.commentary: Limit the number of transactions processed by the application to 20.000 (='4E20') for security reasons

dataElement.name: Accumulator 1 Currency Code
dataElement.commentary: Set to No Currency for unused accumulator

dataElement.name: Accumulator 1 Currency Conversion Table
dataElement.commentary: Set to dummy value for unused accumulator

dataElement.name: Accumulator 1 Lower Limit
dataElement.commentary: Set to zero for online-only profile

dataElement.name: Accumulator 1 Upper Limit
dataElement.commentary: Set to zero for online-only profile

dataElement.name: Accumulator 2 Currency Code
dataElement.commentary: Set to No Currency for unused accumulator

dataElement.name: Accumulator 2 Currency Conversion Table
dataElement.commentary: Set to dummy value for unused accumulator

dataElement.name: Accumulator 2 Lower Limit
dataElement.commentary: Set to zero for unused accumulator

dataElement.name: Accumulator 2 Upper Limit
dataElement.commentary: Set to zero for unused accumulator

dataElement.name: Additional Check Table
dataElement.commentary: default=000000FFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFF

dataElement.name: Counter 1 Lower Limit
dataElement.commentary: Set to zero for online-only profile

dataElement.name: Counter 1 Upper Limit
dataElement.commentary: Set to zero for online-only profile

dataElement.name: Counter 2 Lower Limit
dataElement.commentary: Set to zero for unused counter

dataElement.name: Counter 2 Upper Limit
dataElement.commentary: Set to zero for unused counter

dataElement.name: Card Risk Management Country Code
dataElement.commentary: Country code for Brazil

dataElement.name: Cryptogram Version Number V2.x
dataElement.commentary: default=00

dataElement.name: Default ARPC Response Code
dataElement.commentary: Recommended value to approve online transactions and do not reset counters

dataElement.name: Interface Enabling Switch
dataElement.commentary: Enable only the contact interface

dataElement.name: Maximum Transaction Amount Currency Code
dataElement.commentary: No currency code as Maximum Transaction Amount check is not used

dataElement.name: Number of Days Offline Limit
dataElement.commentary: default=0000

dataElement.name: PIN Try Limit
dataElement.commentary: Set to 3 offline PIN attempts (a value of 3 or more can be used in card sample)

dataElement.name: Log Format
dataElement.commentary: Default value for M/Chip Advance (up to four additional DOL elements (tag and length) can be added by issuer)

dataElement.name: PIN Decipherments Error Counter Limit
dataElement.commentary: Limit the number of PIN decipherment errors to 500 (='01F4') for security reasons

dataElement.name: Data Storage Management Control
dataElement.commentary: Disable integrated data storage

dataElement.name: Common Currency Conversion Table
dataElement.commentary: Set to dummy value for unused conversion table

dataElement.name: Application Interchange Profile (Contact)
dataElement.commentary: Recommended value when CDA & DDA are supported

dataElement.name: Application Control (Contact)
dataElement.commentary: Recommended value for semi grade card profile, Mastercard Proprietary Session Key Derivation (SKD), transaction log, M/Chip 4 host backwards compatibility,Set bit 'Offline Plaintext PIN Verification' as Offline Plaintext PIN is supported,Set bit 'Offline Encrypted PIN Verification' as Offline Enciphered PIN is supported,Set bit 'Enable Alternate Interface After TC Generated' to enable the contactless interface after the first approved contact transaction

dataElement.name: Card Issuer Action Code (Contact) - Decline
dataElement.commentary: Recommended value

dataElement.name: Card Issuer Action Code (Contact) - Default
dataElement.commentary: Recommended value to decline offline when upper limits are exceeded,Set bit 'International Transaction' for online-only profile,Set bit 'Domestic Transaction' for online-only profile,Set bit 'Unable To Go Online Indicated' for online-only profile,Set bit 'Offline PIN Verification Failed' as Offline PIN is supported,Set bit 'PIN Try Limit Exceeded' as Offline PIN is supported,Set bit 'Terminal Erroneously Considers Offline PIN OK' as Offline PIN is supported,Set bit 'Offline PIN Verification not Performed' as Offline PIN is supported

dataElement.name: Card Issuer Action Code (Contact) - Online
dataElement.commentary: Recommended value to send transaction online when limits are exceeded,Set bit 'International Transaction' to send international transaction online,Set bit 'Domestic Transaction' to send domestic transaction online,Set bit 'Offline PIN Verification not Performed' as Offline PIN is supported,Set bit 'Offline PIN Verification Failed' as Offline PIN is supported,Set bit 'PIN Try Limit Exceeded' as Offline PIN is supported,Set bit 'Terminal Erroneously Considers Offline PIN OK' as Offline PIN is supported

dataElement.name: Accumulator 1 Control (Contact)
dataElement.commentary: Disable Accumulator 1 for online-only profile, but include accumulator in IApD for M/Chip 4 host backwards compatibility

dataElement.name: Accumulator 1 CVR Dependency Data (Contact)
dataElement.commentary: default=000000

dataElement.name: Accumulator 2 Control (Contact)
dataElement.commentary: Disable Accumulator 2 for contact transactions

dataElement.name: Accumulator 2 CVR Dependency Data (Contact)
dataElement.commentary: default=000000

dataElement.name: Counter 1 Control (Contact)
dataElement.commentary: Disable Counter 1 for online-only profile, but include counter in IApD for M/Chip 4 host backwards compatibility

dataElement.name: Counter 1 CVR Dependency Data (Contact)
dataElement.commentary: default=000000

dataElement.name: Counter 2 Control (Contact)
dataElement.commentary: Disable Counter 2 for contact transactions

dataElement.name: Counter 2 CVR Dependency Data (Contact)
dataElement.commentary: default=000000

dataElement.name: CVR Issuer Discretionary Data (Contact)
dataElement.commentary: Set to a dummy value when issuer host requires a backward compatibility mode

dataElement.name: Interface Identifier (Contact)
dataElement.commentary: Contact interface identifier

dataElement.name: AC Session Key Counter Limit (Contact)
dataElement.commentary: Limit the number of AC Session Key derivations over the contact interface to 20.000 (= '4E20') for security reasons

dataElement.name: SMI Session Key Counter Limit (Contact)
dataElement.commentary: Limit the number of SMI Session Key derivations over the contact interface that are not followed by a successful validation of a Secure Messaging MAC to 1.024 (= '0400') for security reasons

dataElement.name: Read Record Filter (Contact)
dataElement.commentary: No records filtered over the contact interface

dataElement.name: Application Interchange Profile (Contactless)
dataElement.commentary: Recommended value when CDA is supported and EMV mode is supported

dataElement.name: Application Control (Contactless)
dataElement.commentary: Recommended value for dual interface device with Mastercard Proprietary Session Key Derivation (SKD), transaction log, M/Chip 4 host backwards compatibility,Set bit 'Disable Retrieval of Transaction Log Records' to disable reading of transaction log from contactless interface,Set 'Compute Cryptographic Checksum' bits to 10 when contactless magstripe mode is not supported,Reset bit 'Disable Retrieval of Transaction Log Records' to enable reading of transaction log from contactless interface

dataElement.name: Card Issuer Action Code (Contactless) - Decline
dataElement.commentary: Recommended value when offline PIN is supported on the contact interface,Reset bit 'PIN Try Limit Exceeded' to force online when Offline PIN Try limit is exceeded

dataElement.name: Card Issuer Action Code (Contactless) - Default
dataElement.commentary: Recommended value for online-only profile,Set bit 'PIN Try Limit Exceeded' to force online when Offline PIN Try limit is exceeded

dataElement.name: Card Issuer Action Code (Contactless) - Online
dataElement.commentary: Recommended value for online-only profile,Set bit 'PIN Try Limit Exceeded' to force online when Offline PIN Try limit is exceeded

dataElement.name: Accumulator 1 Control (Contactless)
dataElement.commentary: Disable Accumulator 1 for online-only profile, but include accumulator in IApD for M/Chip 4 host backwards compatibility

dataElement.name: Accumulator 1 CVR Dependency Data (Contactless)
dataElement.commentary: default=000000

dataElement.name: Accumulator 2 Control (Contactless)
dataElement.commentary: Disable Accumulator 2 for contactless transactions

dataElement.name: Accumulator 2 CVR Dependency Data (Contactless)
dataElement.commentary: default=000000

dataElement.name: Counter 1 Control (Contactless)
dataElement.commentary: Disable Counter 1 for online-only profile, but include counter in IApD for M/Chip 4 host backwards compatibility

dataElement.name: Counter 1 CVR Dependency Data (Contactless)
dataElement.commentary: default=000000

dataElement.name: Counter 2 Control (Contactless)
dataElement.commentary: Disable Counter 2 for contactless transactions

dataElement.name: Counter 2 CVR Dependency Data (Contactless)
dataElement.commentary: default=000000

dataElement.name: CVR Issuer Discretionary Data (Contactless)
dataElement.commentary: Set to a dummy value when issuer host requires a backward compatibility mode

dataElement.name: Interface Identifier (Contactless)
dataElement.commentary: Contactless interface identifier

dataElement.name: AC Session Key Counter Limit (Contactless)
dataElement.commentary: Limit the number of AC Session Key derivations over the contactless interface to 20.000 (= '4E20') for security reasons

dataElement.name: SMI Session Key Counter Limit (Contactless)
dataElement.commentary: Limit the number of SMI Session Key derivations over the contactless interface that are not followed by a successful validation of a Secure Messaging MAC to 1.024 (= '0400') for security reasons

dataElement.name: Application Currency Code
dataElement.commentary: Currency code for Brazilian real

dataElement.name: Application Version Number
dataElement.commentary: Version for Mastercard branded products

dataElement.name: Card Risk Management Data Object List 1 (CDOL1)
dataElement.commentary: Recommended value for M/Chip Advance

dataElement.name: Card Risk Management Data Object List 2 (CDOL2)
dataElement.commentary: Recommended value for M/Chip Advance

dataElement.name: Cardholder Verification Method List
dataElement.commentary: Amount X = zero,Amount Y = zero,CVM1 = Online PIN (Fail CVM),CVM2 = Offline Enciphered PIN,CVM3 = Offline Plaintext PIN

dataElement.name: Issuer Action Code - Default
dataElement.commentary: Recommended value,Set bit 'DDA Failed' as DDA is supported,Set bit 'CDA Failed' as CDA is supported,Set bit 'PIN Try Limit Exceeded' as Offline PIN is supported

dataElement.name: Issuer Action Code - Denial
dataElement.commentary: Recommended value

dataElement.name: Issuer Action Code - Online
dataElement.commentary: Recommended value,Set bit 'DDA Failed' as DDA is supported,Set bit 'CDA Failed' as CDA is supported,Set bit 'PIN Try Limit Exceeded' as Offline PIN is supported

dataElement.name: Issuer Country Code
dataElement.commentary: Country code for Brazil

dataElement.name: Certification Authority Public Key Index
dataElement.commentary: Index 05 (= 1.408 bits)

dataElement.name: Static Data Authentication Tag List
dataElement.commentary: Mandatory value

dataElement.name: Dynamic Data Authentication Object List
dataElement.commentary: DDA is supported

dataElement.name: Application Usage Control
dataElement.commentary: Cash, goods, services and purchase with cash back

dataElement.name: Application Currency Code
dataElement.commentary: Currency code for Brazilian real

dataElement.name: Application Usage Control
dataElement.commentary: Cash, goods, services and purchase with cash back

dataElement.commentary: Version for Mastercard branded products

dataElement.name: Card Risk Management Data Object List 1 (CDOL1)
dataElement.commentary: Recommended value for M/Chip Advance

dataElement.name: Card Risk Management Data Object List 2 (CDOL2)
dataElement.commentary: Recommended value for M/Chip Advance

dataElement.name: Cardholder Verification Method List
dataElement.commentary: Amount X = zero,Amount Y = zero,CVM1 = Online PIN (Apply Next),CVM2 = No CVM

dataElement.name: Issuer Action Code - Default
dataElement.commentary: Recommended value when CDA is supported,Set bit 'Transaction Exceeds Floor Limit' for Maestro or Cirrus

dataElement.commentary: Recommended value for Maestro contactless

dataElement.name: Issuer Action Code - Online
dataElement.commentary: Recommended value when CDA is supported

dataElement.commentary: Country code for Brazil

dataElement.name: Number of Days Offline Limit
dataElement.commentary: default=0000

dataElement.name: PIN Try Limit
dataElement.commentary: Set to 3 offline PIN attempts (a value of 3 or more can be used in card sample)

dataElement.name: Log Format
dataElement.commentary: Default value for M/Chip Advance (up to four additional DOL elements (tag and length) can be added by issuer)

dataElement.name: PIN Decipherments Error Counter Limit
dataElement.commentary: Limit the number of PIN decipherment errors to 500 (='01F4') for security reasons

dataElement.name: Data Storage Management Control
dataElement.commentary: Disable integrated data storage

dataElement.name: Application Interchange Profile (Contact)
dataElement.commentary: Recommended value when CDA & DDA are supported

dataElement.name: Application Control (Contact)
dataElement.commentary: Recommended value for semi grade card profile, Mastercard Proprietary Session Key Derivation (SKD), transaction log, M/Chip 4 host backwards compatibility,Set bit 'Offline Plaintext PIN Verification' as Offline Plaintext PIN is supported,Set bit 'Offline Encrypted PIN Verification' as Offline Enciphered PIN is supported,Set bit 'Enable Alternate Interface After TC Generated' to enable the contactless interface after the first approved contact transaction

dataElement.name: Card Issuer Action Code (Contact) - Decline
dataElement.commentary: Recommended value,Set bit 'Offline PIN Verification Failed' to decline offline when PIN fails

dataElement.name: Card Issuer Action Code (Contact) - Default
dataElement.commentary: Recommended value to decline offline when upper limits are exceeded,Set bit 'International Transaction' for online-only profile,Set bit 'Domestic Transaction' for online-only profile,Set bit 'Offline PIN Verification Failed' as Offline PIN is supported,Set bit 'PIN Try Limit Exceeded' as Offline PIN is supported,Set bit 'Terminal Erroneously Considers Offline PIN OK' as Offline PIN is supported,Reset bit 'Offline PIN Verification Failed' to decline offline when PIN fails

dataElement.name: Card Issuer Action Code (Contact) - Online
dataElement.commentary: Recommended value to send transaction online when limits are exceeded,Set bit 'International Transaction' to send international transaction online,Set bit 'Domestic Transaction' to send domestic transaction online,Set bit 'Offline PIN Verification not Performed' as Offline PIN is supported,Set bit 'Offline PIN Verification Failed' as Offline PIN is supported,Set bit 'PIN Try Limit Exceeded' as Offline PIN is supported,Set bit 'Terminal Erroneously Considers Offline PIN OK' as Offline PIN is supported,Reset bit 'Offline PIN Verification Failed' to decline offline when PIN fails

dataElement.name: Accumulator 1 Control (Contact)
dataElement.commentary: Disable Accumulator 1 for online-only profile, but include accumulator in IApD for M/Chip 4 host backwards compatibility

dataElement.name: Accumulator 1 CVR Dependency Data (Contact)
dataElement.commentary: default=000000

dataElement.name: Accumulator 2 Control (Contact)
dataElement.commentary: Disable Accumulator 2 for contact transactions

dataElement.name: Accumulator 2 CVR Dependency Data (Contact)
dataElement.commentary: default=000000

dataElement.name: Counter 1 Control (Contact)
dataElement.commentary: Disable Counter 1 for online-only profile, but include counter in IApD for M/Chip 4 host backwards compatibility

dataElement.name: Counter 1 CVR Dependency Data (Contact)
dataElement.commentary: default=000000

dataElement.name: Counter 2 Control (Contact)
dataElement.commentary: Disable Counter 2 for contact transactions

dataElement.name: Counter 2 CVR Dependency Data (Contact)
dataElement.commentary: default=000000

dataElement.name: CVR Issuer Discretionary Data (Contact)
dataElement.commentary: Set to a dummy value when issuer host requires a backward compatibility mode

dataElement.name: Interface Identifier (Contact)
dataElement.commentary: Contact interface identifier

dataElement.name: AC Session Key Counter Limit (Contact)
dataElement.commentary: Limit the number of AC Session Key derivations over the contact interface to 20.000 (= '4E20') for security reasons

dataElement.name: SMI Session Key Counter Limit (Contact)
dataElement.commentary: Limit the number of SMI Session Key derivations over the contact interface that are not followed by a successful validation of a Secure Messaging MAC to 1.024 (= '0400') for security reasons

dataElement.name: Read Record Filter (Contact)
dataElement.commentary: No records filtered over the contact interface

dataElement.name: Application Interchange Profile (Contactless)
dataElement.commentary: Recommended value when CDA is supported and EMV mode is supported

dataElement.name: Application Control (Contactless)
dataElement.commentary: Recommended value for dual interface device with Mastercard Proprietary Session Key Derivation (SKD), transaction log, M/Chip 4 host backwards compatibility,Set bit 'Disable Retrieval of Transaction Log Records' to disable reading of transaction log from contactless interface,Set 'Compute Cryptographic Checksum' bits to 10 when contactless magstripe mode is not supported,Reset bit 'Disable Retrieval of Transaction Log Records' to enable reading of transaction log from contactless interface

dataElement.name: Card Issuer Action Code (Contactless) - Decline
dataElement.commentary: Recommended value when offline PIN is supported on the contact interface,Reset bit 'PIN Try Limit Exceeded' to force online when Offline PIN Try limit is exceeded

dataElement.name: Card Issuer Action Code (Contactless) - Default
dataElement.commentary: Recommended value for online-only profile,Set bit 'PIN Try Limit Exceeded' to force online when Offline PIN Try limit is exceeded

dataElement.name: Card Issuer Action Code (Contactless) - Online
dataElement.commentary: Recommended value for online-only profile,Set bit 'PIN Try Limit Exceeded' to force online when Offline PIN Try limit is exceeded

dataElement.name: Accumulator 1 Control (Contactless)
dataElement.commentary: Disable Accumulator 1 for online-only profile, but include accumulator in IApD for M/Chip 4 host backwards compatibility

dataElement.name: Accumulator 1 CVR Dependency Data (Contactless)
dataElement.commentary: default=000000

dataElement.commentary: default=000000

dataElement.name: Counter 1 Control (Contactless)
dataElement.commentary: Disable Counter 1 for online-only profile, but include counter in IApD for M/Chip 4 host backwards compatibility

dataElement.name: Counter 1 CVR Dependency Data (Contactless)
dataElement.commentary: default=000000

dataElement.name: Counter 2 Control (Contactless)
dataElement.commentary: Disable Counter 2 for contactless transactions

dataElement.name: Counter 2 CVR Dependency Data (Contactless)
dataElement.commentary: default=000000

dataElement.name: CVR Issuer Discretionary Data (Contactless)
dataElement.commentary: Set to a dummy value when issuer host requires a backward compatibility mode

dataElement.name: Interface Identifier (Contactless)
dataElement.commentary: Contactless interface identifier

dataElement.name: AC Session Key Counter Limit (Contactless)
dataElement.commentary: Limit the number of AC Session Key derivations over the contactless interface to 20.000 (= '4E20') for security reasons

dataElement.name: SMI Session Key Counter Limit (Contactless)
dataElement.commentary: Limit the number of SMI Session Key derivations over the contactless interface that are not followed by a successful validation of a Secure Messaging MAC to 1.024 (= '0400') for security reasons

dataElement.name: Application Currency Code
dataElement.commentary: Currency code for Brazilian real

dataElement.name: Application Version Number
dataElement.commentary: Version for Mastercard branded products

dataElement.name: Card Risk Management Data Object List 1 (CDOL1)
dataElement.commentary: Recommended value for M/Chip Advance

dataElement.name: Card Risk Management Data Object List 2 (CDOL2)
dataElement.commentary: Recommended value for M/Chip Advance

dataElement.name: Cardholder Verification Method List
dataElement.commentary: Amount X = zero,Amount Y = zero,CVM1 = Online PIN at ATM,CVM2 = Offline Enciphered PIN,CVM3 = Offline Plaintext PIN,CVM4 = Online PIN (Apply Next),CVM5 = Signature,CVM6 = No CVM

dataElement.name: Issuer Action Code - Default
dataElement.commentary: Recommended value,Set bit 'DDA Failed' as DDA is supported,Set bit 'CDA Failed' as CDA is supported,Set bit 'PIN Try Limit Exceeded' as Offline PIN is supported

dataElement.commentary: Recommended value

dataElement.commentary: Cash, goods and services,Reset bit 'Domestic Cashback Allowed',Reset bit 'International Cashback Allowed'
